Telkom University

A brotherhood of highly passionate and competitive student in Telkom University. A group of enthusiastic people in tech, business, design, and innovation.

Our Activities

Teknofest

Yearly event that celebrates the newcomers wrapped in Insightful Event.Introducing new things to newcomers.

Probation

Intensive bootcamp for newcomers, aiming to break all of its participants limits.

ProDiscuss

Weekly internal discussion about trending things around tech, business, and design.

ProTalk

Spreading ideas and knowledge through manner of speaking.
